mainText:
PROMO: Bank of Entitlement - Where Your Every Whim Becomes Reality! Your demands are our commands!

Visit Bank of Entitlement dot com for more.

ENTITLEMENT STORY: So, there I was, strolling into my favorite coffee shop like the VIP I am, when I noticed they were out of my beloved triple-shot, half-caff, extra foam latte. The nerve! I marched right up to the counter, my designer shades shielding my eyes from the injustice unfolding before me. "Excuse me," I said, making sure my tone dripped with entitlement. "Do you have any idea who I am? I'm Hot Josh, the CEO of Bank of Entitlement, and I demand satisfaction!" The barista, clearly flustered by my presence, stammered an apology and offered to make a fresh batch just for me. As I sipped my free latte, basking in the sweet taste of victory, I knew that my entitlement had once again prevailed. Ah, the perks of being me.
